name: Lost gargoyle
description:
Lost gargoyle

A small gargoyle fell from the tower and damaged its wing, an ancient sword with intelligence flew to its aid. Help the little gargoyle get back home to the top of the tower before the sun rises, otherwise its wing will never heal. On its way, you will meet wild mushrooms that consider this tower their home, so they will prevent you on your way.

 Have a good game
